tool_description: Transforms spatial coordinates between different coordinate reference systems and performs coordinate validation for geological survey data.

input_coordinates_path.description: Path to file containing coordinates to be transformed

source_crs.description: Source coordinate reference system (e.g., EPSG:4326, UTM_Zone_33N, local_mine_grid)

target_crs.description: Target coordinate reference system for transformation

coordinate_columns.description: Column names containing X, Y, and optionally Z coordinates

error_messages: Coordinates file not found: Ensure the input_coordinates_path is valid and accessible.
Unsupported coordinate system: Verify that source_crs and target_crs are valid CRS identifiers.
Invalid coordinate columns: Provide 2 or 3 column names for X, Y, and optionally Z coordinates.
Coordinate transformation failed: The specified coordinate systems are incompatible or invalid.
Missing coordinate data: Some rows contain null or invalid coordinate values.
usage: Provide the path to coordinate data, specify source and target coordinate systems, and identify the coordinate columns. The tool transforms coordinates and validates the results.

transformed_points.description: Number of coordinate points successfully transformed

coordinate_bounds.description: Bounding box of transformed coordinates [min_x, min_y, max_x, max_y]

transformation_summary.description: Summary of coordinate transformation process and results
